data¶

Module data contains the class Data and some functions to read and prepare data from the radiosonde.

class data.Data(filename)¶

Class Data reads and prepares the radiosonde data and returns it to class Plot for plotting

get_dest()¶

Return destination and name of the weater atation that launched the radiosonde.

get_dwpt()¶

Return the dewpoint as a numpy file. Function gets called by the initialisation of a Plot object.

get_pressure()¶

Return the pressure as a numpy file. Function gets called by the initialisation of a Plot object.

get_temp()¶

Return the temperature as a numpy file. Function gets called by the initialisation of a Plot object.

data.read_tab(filename)¶

Read the information from the filename file and returns it in a way the Data class can handle it.

radio
